Package index

All functions

clueRIO clueRIO-package
clueRIO: Input/Output management for CLUMondo
clue_commodity()
Set commodities and their attributes
clue_conversion()
Set a conversion rule
clue_driver()
Set drivers of land systems
clue_example()
Build an example CLUE scene
clue_initiate()
Prepare the CLUE model directory
clue_landsystems()
Set the initial land systems information
clue_landtype()
Set land types and their attributes
clue_options()
Set options of the current model run
clue_run()
Run the model
clue_scene()
Create a new CLUE scene
clue_validate()
Validate the current status of a model
finetune()
Finetune a model
makeModel()
Build all files required for the model
mod_crop_rotation()
Crop rotation modifier
regCommodity()
Set commodities
regDemand()
Set the table of demand
regGridded()
Set gridded objects
regLanduse()
Set land-use types
regRegions()
Set distinct regions to model
registry-class registry
CLUE scene class (S4) and methods
runModel()
Run the model
setConversion()
Set a conversion rule
setLAT()
Set a raster attribute table of the landuse grid (LAT)
setNeighbourhood()
Specify neighbourhood models
setPreference()
Set a location specific preference
setProduction()
Set production of commodities by land-use types
setSuitability()
Specify suitability models
show(<registry>)
Print registry in the console (not working yet)
showAnimation()
Animate landuse change
showSequence()
Graph of landuse conversion sequence
showSuitability()
Plot of suitabilities
startProject()
Start a new project
testModel()
Test the model specification
useModifier()
Modify parts of a model
